law.catch_line: The preservation of a designated structure under this title includes preservation of an associated:...

text.section:
The preservation of a designated structure under this title includes preservation of an associated:
natural land formation; and
appurtenance and environmental setting.

This title may not be construed to prevent routine maintenance, customary farming operations, or landscaping that does not have a material effect on the historic, archaeological, or architectural significance of a designated site, structure, or district.
